name: Goblin Hunter
description:
These goblins just keep coming - try to collect as much bounty as possible, by slaying them all! 

Use the arrow keys to attack and your mouse to make decisions.

Goblin Hunter was made using Unity. If you enjoyed it please  share it with your friends. If you want to see Goblin Hunter grow or you would like to support future projects, please feel free to donate. Thank you  and enjoy.
